Last chance to enjoy Performance Motors anniversary exclusive deals this week!

What's more, you and your family can enjoy delectable treats from Hyde & Co., Two Bakers and The 1872 Clipper Tea Co., as well as fun hands-on activities from Artefakts this coming weekend. We hope to see you there at 303 Alexandra Road.

1.post_text:
The BMW 5 Series is the embodiment of the modern business saloon – it combines both aesthetic athleticism and driving pleasure with state-of-the-art technology.

Visit us at 303 Alexandra Road or call 6653 8051 to book your test drive.

2.post_text:
From now till 30 Nov 2017, sign up for the Performance Motors Oil Service Package and enjoy 3 sessions for the price of 2!

Visit 303 Alexandra Road or call 1800-2255-269 (1800-CALL-BMW) and speak to any of our BMW Customer Service Advisors.

3.post_text:
Join us at our anniversary celebrations at 303 Alexandra Road, as we bring you a lineup of exciting activities for you and your family. Be sure to enjoy delectable treats from Hyde & Co., Two Bakers, and The 1872 Clipper Tea Co., as well as indulge in hands-on activities from Artefakts.

Our anniversary celebrations are on from today till 3 Sep and next weekend from 9-10 Sep 2017. We would also like to take this opportunity to wish our Muslim customers Selamat Hari Raya Haji!

The weekend also promises you deals on BMW Lifestyle Collection and Aftersales Service, along with delicious treats and craft activities.

Visit Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road or call 6653 8051 to find out more.

9.post_text:
We are pleased to be the Presenter of the prestigious Her World Woman of the Year 2017 for the 2nd year in a row. Since 1991, this award has been given to trail-blazing females who break boundaries in their professions and make outstanding contributions to society.

Performance Motors would like to congratulate architect Angelene Chan for clinching Her World Woman of the Year award and filmmaker Kristen Tan for winning the Young Woman Achiever award!

10.post_text:
Let the BMW 7 Series take your breath away once again with more of what gave the ultimate luxury sedan its name. Discover game-changing technology and contemporary design, alongside greater fuel savings and reduced carbon emissions for an unparalleled drive.

Own the newest generation of the BMW 7 Series at exclusive trade-in rates*. Visit Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road or call us at 6653 8051 to book your test drive today.

*Terms and Conditions apply.

Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8051 to book a test drive.
*Terms and conditions apply.

21.post_text:

Visit Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road or call 6653 8051 to book a test drive to experience it for yourself.
